issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: SC failure to start in rare cases

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I am seeing in GA runs and other tests run through QA that Eucalyptus fails to start resulting in total failure. Some things stand out in cloud-output.log

{code}
2014-01-21 14:59:45 ERROR | BUG: Fix your message type definitions for class com.eucalyptus.walrus.msgs.GetObjectExtendedResponseType
2014-01-21 14:59:45 ERROR | BUG: Binding generation encountered an element naming conflict.  Using com.eucalyptus.walrus.msgs.GetObjectExtendedResponseType for com.eucalyptus.walrus.msgs.GetObjectExtendedResponseType
{code}

and
{code}
2014-01-21 14:59:57 ERROR | org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException:
                          | *** Error during code generation for file 'jar:file:/usr/share/eucalyptus/eucalyptus-msgs-4.0.0.jar!/2011-01-01-binding.xml' -
                          |  this may be due to an error in your binding or classpath, or to an error in the JiBX code ***

*** Error during code generation for file 'jar:file:/usr/share/eucalyptus/eucalyptus-msgs-4.0.0.jar!/2011-01-01-binding.xml' -
 this may be due to an error in your binding or classpath, or to an error in the JiBX code ***

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Class still being constructed
        at org.jibx.binding.classes.ClassFile.hashCode(ClassFile.java:1801)
        at org.jibx.binding.classes.ClassFile.equals(ClassFile.java:1881)
        at java.util.HashMap.getEntry(HashMap.java:471)
        at java.util.HashMap.get(HashMap.java:421)
        at org.jibx.binding.classes.MungedClass.getUniqueSupportClass(MungedClass.java:206)
        at org.jibx.binding.def.MappingDefinition.generateCode(MappingDefinition.java:889)
        at org.jibx.binding.def.DefinitionContext.generateCode(DefinitionContext.java:620)
        at org.jibx.binding.def.BindingDefinition.generateCode(BindingDefinition.java:1082)
        at com.eucalyptus.binding.BindingCache$BindingFileSearch.compile(BindingCache.java:404)
        at com.eucalyptus.binding.BindingCache.compileBindings(BindingCache.java:148)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.Bootstrap.init(Bootstrap.java:556)
        at com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.SystemBootstrapper.init(SystemBootstrapper.java:200)
{code}

comments.body: the issue has been resolved by merging 3.4.2 code fixes into the 4.0 testing branch. EUCA-8509 was the root cause.
